replies.body:
Yes weekend game mode!!

[One for All is live from 11 AM - 3 AM AEST from Friday - Monday!](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/gameplay/rotating-game-mode-queue-now-live-15)
No, no weekend game mode. It is not in the client.
Yes it is. I played like 10 OFA's this weekend
the "one person gets there main then flames the rest of the team for playing shitty on a champ they don't even own." game mode
Well, I'm not fond of Rotating Game Modes myself so if you're like me you can just stick to the serious modes like TT & SR. :D
